definition: to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span
to span/to stretch across/to travel across
to mount (a horse, bike, flight of stairs, rickshaw etc)
to appear in sb's show/to give one's support
interregional/spanning two or more PRC provinces

sentences.english: Transregional inspection shall be organized by a higher-level TLIA.
sentences.chinese: 跨区域征费稽查的，由上一级交通征费稽查机构组织。

sentences.english: This study probed into the mechanism of cross-language syntactic priming.
sentences.chinese: 本研究考察跨语言句法启动及其机制。

sentences.english: Is there a body that looks at cross-functional application reusability?
sentences.chinese: 是否有团体在考虑跨功能应用程序的可重用性？

sentences.english: As soon as the captain heard the sound of the lock being turned, he stepped forward.
sentences.chinese: 一听到锁的转动声，船长就立刻一步跨世上前去。

sentences.english: Design games to work well across multiple screen sizes.
sentences.chinese: 设计能够跨多样式屏幕运行的游戏。

sentences.english: This will be coupled with a shift toward data fusion across multiple platforms and a move toward network-centric capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 这将推动跨多个平台的数据融合以及网络中心能力。

sentences.english: Another key feature SCA offers is cross-application policy.
sentences.chinese: SCA提供的另一关键特性是是跨应用的策略。

sentences.english: The dynamic interaction between the maglev vehicle and the three-span rigid frame bridge is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了磁浮车辆与三跨刚构桥之间的耦合振动。

sentences.english: A little man got off the horse's back .
sentences.chinese: 一位小个子的男士跨下马背。

sentences.english: A guard opened the door of the train and the Commander got in.
sentences.chinese: 一个卫兵打开火车门，扎达克跨了进去。

sentences.english: The degree of hybridity is conditioned by the power of discourse and the effects of cross-cultural communication.
sentences.chinese: 译文杂合程度受权力话语和跨丈化交际效果的制约。

sentences.english: Horizontal gene transfer (HGT) is a cross-species form of genetic transfer.
sentences.chinese: 横向基因迁移是指跨物种形式的遗传迁移。

sentences.english: The result of that is much closer regulatory oversight on the transpacific carriers that is probably necessary.
sentences.chinese: 这种对跨太平洋承运人的管理监督是有必要的。

sentences.english: But too wide to cross from one side on the land.
sentences.chinese: 但站在其中一边的地面上看，那深坑阔得无法跨过去。

sentences.english: Remember that the main gusset is slightly shortened to accommodate the cross-member gusset.
sentences.chinese: 记住，主要扣板略有缩短，以满足跨成员扣板。

definition: to span/to stretch across/to travel across
to open access/to establish contact/to remove a block/to put through (a phone connection)
to detour/to bypass/to circumvent/to avoid/to wind around (of a road etc)
to proceed in parallel/side by side (of two processes, developments, thoughts etc)
lit. warp string in weaving/fig. vertical or north-south lines/to pass through/to cross lengthwise/to pierce (esp. north-south or top-to-bottom)
